flawed_nl_solution:
When he gave 40 seashells to his friends, Ali had 180-40= <<180-40=140>>140 seashells.
When he gave another 30 seashells to his brothers, he had 140-30 = <<140-30=120>>120 seashells
He also sold half of the seashells, a total of 1/2*120 = <<60=60>>60 seashells
He was left with 120-60= <<120-60=60>>60 seashells
#### 60

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 110, not 120. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
